Comment: Skipping verification exposes the connection to man-in-the-middle attacks and should never be used in production code.
Skipping verification exposes the connection to man-in-the-middle attacks and should never be used in production code.
Snippet:
serverTwo := httptest.NewUnstartedServer(http.HandlerFunc(func(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) {}))

	serverTwo.TLS = &tls.Config{ // Issue
		Rand: zeroSource{},
		InsecureSkipVerify: true,
	}

	serverTwo.StartTLS()
